tit.cmt: 木下を大文字に変更しました。

sen.j: 木下 巌（きのした いわお、弘化3年(1846年) - 慶応4年8月21日 (旧暦)(1868年10月6日)）は、阿波国徳島出身（山城国出身との説もあり）の新選組隊士。
sen.e: Iwao Kinoshita (1846 - October 6, 1868) was a member of Shinsengumi (a group who guarded Kyoto during the end of Tokugawa Shogunate) from Tokushima, Awa Province (there is another theory that he was from Yamashiro Province).

Iwao KINOSHITA (1846 - October 6, 1868) was a member of Shinsengumi (a group who guarded Kyoto during the end of Tokugawa Shogunate) from Tokushima, Awa Province (there is another theory that he was from Yamashiro Province).
sen.cmt: 木下を大文字に変更しました。 木下の前のスペースを削除しました。
sen.e: Iwao KINOSHITA (1846 - October 6, 1868) was a member of Shinsengumi (a group who guarded Kyoto during the end of Tokugawa Shogunate) from Tokushima, Awa Province (there is another theory that he was from Yamashiro Province).
Corporal.
Corporal.
Corporal.
Head of Ju
Head of Ju
Head of Ju

sen.j: 木下弥三郎と同一人物と考えられる。
sen.e: He is thought to be the same person as Yasaburo Kinoshita.
He is thought to be the same person as Yasaburo KINOSHITA.
sen.cmt: 木下を大文字に変更しました。
sen.e: He is thought to be the same person as Yasaburo KINOSHITA.

sen.j: 元治元年（1864年）、新選組に入隊。
sen.e: He joined Shinsengumi in 1864.
He joined Shinsengumi in 1864.
He joined Shinsengumi in 1864.

sen.j: 慶応2年（1866年）9月の三条制札事件に出動した。
sen.e: He turned out to the Sanjo-ohashi Bridge Noticeboard Incident in October, 1866.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処。
sen.e: He turned out to the Sanjo-ohashi Bridge Noticeboard Incident in October, 1866.
He turned out to the Sanjo-ohashi Bridge Noticeboard Incident in October, 1866.

sen.j: 戊辰戦争では鳥羽伏見の戦い、甲州勝沼の戦いを経て、母成峠の戦いで戦死した。
sen.e: In the Boshin War, he fought in the Battle of Toba-Fushimi and The Battle of Koshu-Katsunuma, and was killed on the field of the Battle of Bonari-toge.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処。
sen.e: In the Boshin War, he fought in the Battle of Toba-Fushimi and The Battle of Koshu-Katsunuma, and was killed on the field of the Battle of Bonari-toge.
sen.cmt: killedの前のスペースを削除しました。
sen.e: In the Boshin War, he fought in the Battle of Toba-Fushimi and The Battle of Koshu-Katsunuma, and was killed on the field of the Battle of Bonari-toge.
Died at 23.
Died at 23.
Died at 23.
